snippet: Registrations of new passenger cars in the European Union, a proxy for sales, rose 6.7 percent in January from a year earlier.
abstract: European Automobile Manufacturers’ Assn reports registration of passenger cars rose 6.7 percent in January from year-earlier period, continuing modest upward momentum.
lead_paragraph: Registrations of new passenger cars in the European Union, a proxy for sales, rose 6.7 percent in January from a year earlier.

headline.main: In Europe, Car Sales Gain for 17th Straight Month
headline.print_headline: Car Sales in Europe Up 6.7% in January
